description: The conversation shows MarketInsightAI gathering recent augmented‑reality glasses patents, scraping source pages, extracting the patent numbers and filing companies, and delivering a concise list to the innovation lead.

messages.content: You are MarketInsightAI, an agentic LLM that automatically gathers data from the web, extracts relevant entities, and synthesizes actionable research briefs. Use the available tools (web_search, scrape_page, extract_entities, estimate_market_size, summarize_report) to fulfill user requests.
I need a list of patents filed in the past year for augmented‑reality glasses, along with the companies that filed them.
Sure, I’ll start by searching for recent AR‑glasses patent filings.

- **Apple patents AR‑glasses display technology** – [https://patents.google.com/patent/US20230012345A1](https://patents.google.com/patent/US20230012345A1) – Apple filed a continuation‑in‑part for a see‑through AR display system (filed Jan 2023).
- **Meta Platforms files “AR eyewear optics” patent** – [https://patents.google.com/patent/US20230056789A1](https://patents.google.com/patent/US20230056789A1) – Meta’s patent on waveguide optics for smart glasses (filed Feb 2023).
- **Snap Inc. submits “Real‑time AR overlay” patent** – [https://patents.google.com/patent/US20230123456A1](https://patents.google.com/patent/US20230123456A1) – Snap’s filing on real‑time AR content compositing (filed Mar 2023).
- **Microsoft patents “Mixed‑reality head‑mounted display”** – [https://patents.google.com/patent/US20230234567A1](https://patents.google.com/patent/US20230234567A1) – Microsoft’s filing for a mixed‑reality HMD (filed Apr 2023).
- **Magic Leap files “Depth‑aware AR lenses” patent** – [https://patents.google.com/patent/US20230345678A1](https://patents.google.com/patent/US20230345678A1) – Magic Leap’s patent on depth‑sensing lenses (filed May 2023).
I’ll scrape each of these pages to pull the exact patent titles and the assignee companies.

Title: "See‑through augmented reality display system"
Assignee: Apple Inc.
Filing date: 2023‑01‑15
Abstract: A see‑through display system for AR glasses comprising a waveguide, projector, and eye‑tracking module...

Title: "AR eyewear optics with waveguide" 
Assignee: Meta Platforms, Inc.
Filing date: 2023‑02‑08
Abstract: The disclosure relates to optics for AR eyewear, including a waveguide that directs light from a micro‑display to the user’s eye...

Title: "Real‑time AR overlay generation" 
Assignee: Snap Inc.
Filing date: 2023‑03‑22
Abstract: Systems and methods for generating real‑time augmented reality overlays on video streams captured by smart glasses...

Title: "Mixed‑reality head‑mounted display apparatus" 
Assignee: Microsoft Corporation
Filing date: 2023‑04‑10
Abstract: A mixed‑reality head‑mounted display comprising holographic waveguides, eye‑tracking, and spatial audio systems...

Title: "Depth‑aware AR lenses" 
Assignee: Magic Leap, Inc.
Filing date: 2023‑05‑05
Abstract: AR lenses that incorporate depth‑sensing cameras to adjust focal planes for improved depth perception...
Now I’ll extract the relevant entities (patent titles and assignee companies) from the scraped texts.

arguments.text: Title: "See‑through augmented reality display system" Assignee: Apple Inc. Filing date: 2023‑01‑15 Title: "AR eyewear optics with waveguide" Assignee: Meta Platforms, Inc. Filing date: 2023‑02‑08 Title: "Real‑time AR overlay generation" Assignee: Snap Inc. Filing date: 2023‑03‑22 Title: "Mixed‑reality head‑mounted display apparatus" Assignee: Microsoft Corporation Filing date: 2023‑04‑10 Title: "Depth‑aware AR lenses" Assignee: Magic Leap, Inc. Filing date: 2023‑05‑05

Here is the compiled list of AR‑glasses patents filed in the last 12 months, together with the companies that filed them:

- **Apple Inc.** – *See‑through augmented reality display system* (US 20230012345A1) – filed 15 Jan 2023
- **Meta Platforms, Inc.** – *AR eyewear optics with waveguide* (US 20230056789A1) – filed 8 Feb 2023
- **Snap Inc.** – *Real‑time AR overlay generation* (US 20230123456A1) – filed 22 Mar 2023
- **Microsoft Corporation** – *Mixed‑reality head‑mounted display apparatus* (US 20230234567A1) – filed 10 Apr 2023
- **Magic Leap, Inc.** – *Depth‑aware AR lenses* (US 20230345678A1) – filed 5 May 2023

These patents represent the most recent publicly disclosed filings for augmented‑reality glasses. Let me know if you need deeper details (e.g., claims, inventors) or a market‑size estimate for the AR‑glasses sector.
